density
Class Evaluate

java.lang.Object
  density.Evaluate

public class Evaluate
extends java.lang.Object

An Evaluate object is used to make a prediction from a Maxent model for a given set of enviromental variable values.

Constructor Summary
Evaluate(java.lang.String lambdafile)
          Construct an evaluation object for a Maxent model file
 
Method Summary
 double evaluate()
          Evaluate the Maxent model on the given environmental variable values.
 Params getParams()
          Returns the Params object, which can be used to set parameters that affect evaluation of the model, such as "extrapolate".
 void setValue(java.lang.String variable, double value)
          Set a value for an environmental variable
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

         throws java.io.IOException

Method Detail

setValue

public void setValue(java.lang.String variable,
                     double value)
Set a value for an environmental variable

Parameters:
variable - the environmental variable
value - the value to be assigned to the variable

evaluate

public double evaluate()
Evaluate the Maxent model on the given environmental variable values. Produces output in Maxent's logistic format. This method should only be called after all variables have been assigned values.

getParams

public Params getParams()
Returns the Params object, which can be used to set parameters that affect evaluation of the model, such as "extrapolate".
